DOC.brief_summary: Breast cancer patient often suffer long-term physical symptom weakness . In study , investigator propose compare two different low intensity physical exercise training program improve handgrip strength breast cancer patient symptoms weakness . Using brain imaging , study also investigate change brain structure , muscle activity associate handgrip .
DOC.brief_title: Neurophysiological Evaluation Training Effect Cancer-Related Weakness
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomize either treatment group one two low intensity 6-week exercise training . Outcomes measured baseline , post-intervention 4 week post intervention .
